sentences.en: " Mr. Guild Leader, think of something, I beg you.
sentences.cn: “ 会长先生, 总求你想想法子,做好事.

sentences.en: Academies and guild halls were two different kinds of Chinese traditional architectures.
sentences.cn: 书院与会馆是两种不同类型的传统建筑,具有共性,又有鲜明的个性.

sentences.en: Bloodshot: good luck to your guild, whats is called again?
sentences.cn: 祝你的公会好运, 对了你公会叫什么来着?

sentences.en: Huguang Guild Hall is the best place to enjoy Peking Opera.
sentences.cn: 宣武区湖广会馆是欣赏北京京剧的最佳场所.

sentences.en: I belong to a guild of wine butlers.
sentences.cn: 我属于主管酒类的男仆同业公会.

sentences.en: It's unknown if guild achievements will provide XP or currency.
sentences.cn: 目前还不知道公会成就是否也会提供公会经验值或者公会货币.

sentences.en: Masons'Guild house reduces the cost of stone buildings, and improves happiness.
sentences.cn: 石匠行会能够削减石制建筑修建成本, 并可以提高城邑居民快乐程度.

sentences.en: On the 21 st of next month there is a meeting of the Women's Guild.
sentences.cn: 下月21日,妇女协会将举行会议.

sentences.en: The head of the Merchants Guild had indicated a bribe of two hundred dollars.
The head of the Merchants Guild held up two fingers, then quickly departed.
sentences.cn: 商会长说着,伸两个指头一扬, 就匆匆地走了.

sentences.en: The same thing holds for the guild member in the medieval towns.
sentences.cn: 中世纪城市的行会市民,也是如此.

sentences.en: The Thieves'Guild is friend to everyone and no one.
sentences.cn: 盗贼行会是所有人的朋友,同时它也会六亲不认.

sentences.en: Therefore, companies need scientific and systematic results to guild their procurement strategy.
sentences.cn: 因此, 企业迫切需要科学、系统和实用的理论研究成果做指导.

sentences.en: Use Guild ranks as a method for rewarding good guild members.
sentences.cn: 使用公会等级来回馈优秀的工会成员.

trans.tran_cn: 行会，协会，同业公会，[植]依赖植物集团
trans.tran_en: an organization of people who do the same job or have the same interests
